title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning       In this section, you will find a variety of Management Plans and other documents pertaining to the planning, management and operation of Point Reyes National Seashore. Click on a link below to find out more. American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 Current Planning Efforts Reading Room General Management Plans Business Plans Fire Management Plan Legislation Code of Federal Regulations and Superintendent's Compendium Year in Review  Other Planning Efforts and Management Documents  The Citizen's Guide to the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) is a useful resource for those that are not familiar with NEPA or Council on Environmental Quality Regulations. This 45-page guide, published in December, 2007, describes the NEPA process and provides information on how citizens can get involved. Top of Page
